name: International Research and Studies
objective: To improve foreign language, area, and other international studies training through support of research, studies, development of specialized instructional materials, and the publication of specialized materials developed as a result of research conducted under this program.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: VI, A, 605, Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended (HEA).

rules_regulations: Program regulations are available at 34 CFR 655, 660, and the Education Department General Administrative Regulations.  Contact the program office for information.
